website_summaries.verdict: A well-built bookcase bed that integrates a trundle bed and additional storage space.
pros: Built from sturdy pine, the bookcase extends the length of the mattress, rather than the width, allowing for more storage on the five shelves
The bonus trundle bed supports adults
Three drawers and a cubbyhole offer extra storage below
cons: The bed has no headboard, so some owners prefer to move it into a corner
The trundle may be difficult to roll out on carpet

customer_reviews.title: Solid and beautiful bed. Difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Great bed. Looks fantastic and the trundle is great. Very sturdy once built. A lot of work to put together. A lot! One of the things I didn't anticipate was that with no headboard my son's pillow slides off the bed shortly after he falls asleep and he goes the whole night without a pillow or has to wake up and retrieve the pillow regularly through the night.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Finally put this together and unfortunately there was damage to the face. For the price I would expect better packaging. Not the easiest to assemble but one together very sturdy and nice looking (minus the damage).
customer_reviews.author: Maria Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Two person assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product was as pictured-very quick delivery; exactly what I wanted for my grandsons who are thrilled to have a bed at Grammy's! The younger one had to fill the drawers before going to sleep. I put it together alone- it would have gone smoother with help, but was manageable with using a night stand for supporting the frame. No written directions, only pictures. I missed the nut on the first steps and couldn't understand how the frame was to be held together, finally after checking the directions twice, I saw the nut!
customer_reviews.author: grammyC

product_meta.title: Discovery World Furniture Twin Bookcase Daybed with 3 Drawers and Twin Trundle, Honey
product_meta.description: The Bookcase Daybed offers plenty of storage to optimize your space. The storage space offers ample room for an alarm clock, books, trophies and more! Two accessible storage doors located on each end of the bed provide a perfect cubby area.
feature_bullets: The daybed is constructed from solid pine
Bed includes the headboard which offers plenty of storage space for items such as alarm clocks and books
The drawers are on European drawer glides with positive stops; The twin trundle is on wheels and slides directly under the drawer unit
All Discovery World Furniture beds are tested and certified to meet the ASTM 1427-07 regulations set forth by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
Slat kit is included with the bunk bed making it mattress ready; No need to purchase a Bunkie board or box spring; Mattresses and bedding not included
